MetaData.ProjectTemplate:
Linux Shared Memory and DCAF Example Implements C and DCAF based LVRT applications that run in parallel on an NI Linux RT cRIO target, sharing I/O tag data between them using Linux shared memory. Sample Projects:CompactRIO Linux;shared memory;real-time;RT;cRIO;CompactRIO Linux Shared Memory and DCAF Example source/LV/Linux Shared Memory and DCAF.lvproj> images/SharedMemoryAndDCAF.png documentation/Linux Shared Memory and DCAF Example.html None
